name: Make the Island Float Again
description:
This game is...

This is a game created for Godot Wild Jam #15.

Story

Same morning, same days in the hateful, distrustful world. I don't want to face that world, so I choose sleep again. But I arrive at a weird world.  

반복되는 아침, 불신과 혐오로 가득찬 세상. 주인공은 그 세상을 마주하기 싫어 또다시 잠을 택한다. 그러나 주인공이 도달한 곳은 어느 이상한 세상인데...

Controls
  • move - A, W, D, Space or Left, Up, Right
  • interact - E or Enter
Languages

Korean, English

Thanks to
  • Godot Game Engine (version 3.1.1 stable)
  • Krita (version 4.2.7.1)
  • Free sound effects provider Zapsplat
Changelist v0.1.1
  • Changed the 'Go up' part of the second map to be easier.
  • Tried to fix the bug where a grabbable object will allow the player character to "fly".
v0.1.0

First release!
